description.content: In Germany, all transactions are conducted exclusively in EUR, while in the US, only USD is accepted. Due to the longevity of the mail-order catalog (available for half a year), product prices are often higher than their online counterparts. This exercise focuses on creating a comprehensive pricing model rather than generating individual products, which have already been pre-created by your trainer.

sessions.title: Cart and Order Management
sessions.overview: This session covers how to manage carts and orders in commercetools, including handling frozen carts and the Inventory Mode settings that control stock availability. It also covers shopping lists, shipping methods, and how to manage orders using direct updates or order edits.
